alert.note: Alert for Upper Arkansas River Valley Including Lake County and Chaffee County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 22 at 3:59AM MDT until April 22 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning remains in effect from 9 AM to 9 PM MDT Friday for gusty winds, low relative humidity values, and dry lighting, for fire weather zones 220, 221, 222, and 224 through 237, which includes the San Luis Valley, the Wet Mountain Valley, and all of the southeast mountains and plains. The dry lightning may occur across Kiowa, Bent, Prowers and Baca counties... ...A Fire Weather Watch has been issued for Saturday morning through Saturday evening for gusty winds and low relative humidity values, for fire weather zones 224, 222 and 227 through 237, which includes the San Luis Valley, Fremont county, and most of the southeast plains... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 220... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 9 AM this morning to 9 PM MDT this evening. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 220. * Winds...Southwest 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * Timing...Friday, 9 AM to 9 PM. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Impacts...Critical fire weather conditions will be most widespread below 9500 feet where extreme rates of fire growth and spread will be possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Upper Arkansas River Valley Including Lake County and Chaffee County
